attributes.action: stop rejecting my Hasselhoff for team manager petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You are trying to kill mildenhall IMO,accept my petition for Hasselhoff to be TM or this petiton will gain signatures and quick. be afraid,be very afraid suckers.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
